sentences.en: an aesthetic appreciation of the landscape
sentences.cn: 用审美的眼光欣赏风景

sentences.en: Donkeys outnumber cars in this landscape of tiny stone-walled fields.
sentences.cn: 在这片以石墙隔出巴掌大的农田的乡村，驴子比汽车还多。

sentences.en: He was lost in the con-templation of the landscape for a while.
sentences.cn: 有一会儿，他怔怔地注视着周围的景物。

sentences.en: He was lost in the contemplation of the landscape.
sentences.cn: 他对着眼前的景色沉思起来。

sentences.en: Malone looked out at the grey-green featureless landscape.
sentences.cn: 马隆向外看着毫无特色的灰绿色的景致。

sentences.en: The altered landscape looks unnatural and weird.
sentences.cn: 改造后的景观看起来很不自然，极其怪异。

sentences.en: the beauty of the New England landscape
The landscape became wider, flatter and very scenic.
sentences.cn: 地势变得更开阔、更平整，风景十分优美。

sentences.en: The landscape is broken only by a string of villages.
sentences.cn: 这片风景中只有一排村庄。

sentences.en: The Memorial seems almost ugly, dominating the landscape for miles around.
sentences.cn: 那座纪念碑耸立在方圆数英里景致之中显得近乎难看。

sentences.en: The Shropshire landscape was an influence on Owen too.
sentences.cn: 什罗普郡的风景也对欧文产生了影响。

sentences.en: This landscape seemed to trap and amplify sounds.
sentences.cn: 这种地貌好像可以笼住并放大声音。

sentences.en: We meandered through a landscape of mountains, rivers, and vineyards.
sentences.cn: 我们在群山、河流和葡萄园构成的美丽画卷中漫步。

sentences.en: We moved to Northamptonshire and a new landscape of hedges and fields.
sentences.cn: 我们迁往北安普敦郡，置身于一派树篱和田野的新景致中。

sentences.en: Wind turbines are large and noisy and they disfigure the landscape.
sentences.cn: 风力涡轮机个头大、噪音响，还会破坏周边风景。

sentences.en: Windmills are a characteristic feature of the Mallorcan landscape.
sentences.cn: 风车是马略卡岛风光的一大特色。

phrases.tran_cn: n. 造园技师；环境美化设计家
造园术，园林建筑学；造景建筑业
景观设计；园林设计；环境景观设计
园林工程；绿化工程；造园工程
n. 风景画家；山水画家

trans.tran_cn: 风景，乡村风景画（风格），形势，横向打印格式
trans.tran_en: an area of countryside or land of a particular type, used especially when talking about its appearance

trans.tran_cn: 对…做景观美化，给…做园林美化
trans.tran_en: to make a park, garden etc look attractive and interesting by changing its design, and by planting trees and bushes etc
to make a park, garden etc look attractive and interesting by changing its design, and by planting trees and bushes etc
